results.title: Rhabdomyolysis with acute renal failure triggered by the seasonal flu vaccination in a patient taking simvastatin.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ had a background of @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_B_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016393 @@@B cell lymphoma@@@ in partial remission.
